heading: HR02120
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE SEVERE RICE CRISIS NOW DEVASTATING THE POOR, IN THE LIGHT OF THE REPORTS OF THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY'S (NFA) NEAR-ZERO PALAY PROCUREMENT IN 2017, ITS ILLEGAL DIVERSION OF P5.1 BILLION BUDGET FOR FOOD SECURITY PROGRAM TO PAY ITS MATURING LOANS, AND PRES. DUTERTE'S POLICY AND DECISION TO PRIORITIZE RICE IMPORTATION AT THE EXPENSE OF FILIPINO FARMERS
principal-authors: CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-09-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02120
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE SEVERE RICE CRISIS NOW DEVASTATING THE POOR, IN THE LIGHT OF THE REPORTS OF THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY'S (NFA) NEAR-ZERO PALAY PROCUREMENT IN 2017, ITS ILLEGAL DIVERSION OF P5.1 BILLION BUDGET FOR FOOD SECURITY PROGRAM TO PAY ITS MATURING LOANS, AND PRES. DUTERTE'S POLICY AND DECISION TO PRIORITIZE RICE IMPORTATION AT THE EXPENSE OF FILIPINO FARMERS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., TINIO, ANTONIO L., DE JESUS, EMMI A., BROSAS, ARLENE D., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
